metadata.title: Help Center
metadata.description: Find answers to common questions and get support

Help.title: Help Center
Help.description: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need

contactSupport.title: Need More Help?
contactSupport.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noResults: No results found for your search

items.question: How do I change my password?
items.answer: You can change your password in the Settings page under the Privacy & Security tab.

items.question: How do I update my payment information?
items.answer: You can update your payment information in the Account page under the Subscriptions tab.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: Refund policies vary by product. Please contact our support team for specific refund requests.

items.question: How do I access my courses?
items.answer: You can access your enrolled courses from your Account Dashboard under the My Courses tab.

items.question: Can I download course materials?
items.answer: Yes, most course materials are available for download. Look for the download button in the course content.

items.question: How long do I have access to a course?
items.answer: Access duration depends on the course. Most courses provide lifetime access once purchased.

items.question: Videos are not playing, what should I do?
items.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser. If issues persist, contact support.

items.question: How do I clear my browser cache?
items.answer: The process varies by browser. Generally, you can press Ctrl+Shift+Delete (Windows) or Command+Shift+Delete (Mac) to access cache clearing options.

items.question: The site is loading slowly, how can I fix this?
items.answer: Try clearing your browser cache, using a different browser, or checking your internet connection. If issues persist, contact support.

hero.title: Selling product descriptions in minutes, not hours
hero.subtitle: We use AI to generate unique, SEO-friendly descriptions that turn your website visitors into buyers.

item1.title: 🚀 Speed up catalog population by 5-10x
item1.description: Generate hundreds of descriptions in the time it used to take for a dozen.

item2.title: 📈 Increase product card conversion
item2.description: Unique and compelling texts sell better and increase trust.

item3.title: 💰 Reduce costs on copywriters
item3.description: Automating routine tasks saves your budget.

item4.title: 🔍 Improve SEO positions
item4.description: Generating unique content positively affects ranking.

item5.title: ✨ Consistency in style and quality
item5.description: Maintain a consistent brand voice across all descriptions.

step1.title: Request and Analysis
step1.description: You provide data about the products and your target audience.

step2.title: Setup and Generation
step2.description: We configure the AI model and generate draft versions of the descriptions.

step3.title: Review and Refinement
step3.description: We coordinate the results and make necessary edits based on your comments.

step4.title: Integration
step4.description: We deliver the finished descriptions to you in a convenient format (CSV, API, etc.).

item1.challenge: Slow addition of new products due to writing descriptions.
item1.result: Accelerated product launch to the site by 7 times.

item2.reviewText: AI descriptions helped us standardize content and improve SEO. Very happy with the speed!

item1.question: How unique are the texts?
item1.answer: We use advanced AI models and conduct plagiarism checks, ensuring a high level of uniqueness (usually 90%+).

item2.question: How is SEO considered?
item2.answer: The AI is trained to include relevant keywords (provided by you or selected by us) and follow best practices for SEO content optimization.

item3.question: What data do you need from me?
item3.answer: Basic product characteristics (name, attributes, material, etc.), information about the target audience, and the desired style/tone of the descriptions.

item4.question: What are the turnaround times?
item4.answer: Depends on the catalog size and setup complexity, but significantly faster than manual writing. For example, 1000 descriptions can be ready in a few days.

item5.question: Is there a trial period/examples?
item5.answer: Yes, we can provide generation examples for several of your products. Contact us to discuss the details.

cta.title: Ready to turn more visitors into buyers?
cta.text: Submit a request to discuss how AI descriptions can increase your sales! Get a cost estimate and examples for your products.

problemSolution.problem2: Descriptions sound generic and don't sell?
problemSolution.problem3: Low search rankings due to non-unique content?

item1.title: Data-Driven Generation
item1.description: We create descriptions considering your product characteristics and target audience.

item2.title: Uniqueness & Plagiarism Check
item2.description: We guarantee text uniqueness and perform plagiarism checks.

item3.title: SEO Adaptation
item3.description: We optimize descriptions for current search engine requirements.

item4.title: Tone of Voice Selection
item4.description: We adapt the text style to your brand and audience.

item5.title: Flexible Export Formats
item5.description: We provide finished descriptions in a convenient format (CSV, JSON, etc.).

portfolio.title: Our Work Examples
portfolio.demoDescription: Enter a product name to see a description example:

tier1.name: Start
tier1.description: Ideal for small shops or testing the service.

tier2.name: Business
tier2.description: For growing stores with a larger catalog.

tier3.name: Custom
tier3.description: For large projects or special requirements.
